text: @maddow After the flight botch, I did some digging to see who is in charge of containing coronavirus in the U.S.  President appointed a 12 member task force, headed by Pharma lobbyist Alex Azar. Only 2 are Drs/science.Redfield-the new head of CDC and Fauci-the head of NIAID. Zero women.
